318517.<center>エテーネ王国お披露目の 式典中に\n創失と呼ばれる現象が 発生し:
During the unveiling ceremony of the Old Ethene Kingdom, a phenomenon called "unmaking" occurs and the mother Marone's existence
disappears without a trace. A mysterious girl suddenly appears and asks him to search for relics left by Dia Kut telecrystal and travel
to an unknown world if he wants to save his mother.

318518.<center>ガートラント王国の グロスナー王の依頼で\nドゥラ院長と共に バ:
At the request of King Grossner of the Kingdom of Gartlant, he and Director Dura investigate the Dia Kut telecrystal device left behind in
the Bakanugure Ruins and are transported to an unknown land. They are transported to an unknown world, not unlike Astoltia.

318519.<center>異世界の調査のため 燈火の探索隊が発足。\n隊員に名乗りをあげた:
The Light Search Party is launched to investigate other worlds. MereadeJiganf Hyuza AsbalEstella Captain Nablette, who has been
named as a member of the team, and Porte, a girl he met at the unveiling ceremony, set out on a journey to an unknown world in search of
clues that will break the curse of unmaking.

318520.<center>ポルテと共に 未知の世界を 探索すると\n峠のほこらで 女神ゼネ:
When he and Porte explore the unknown world, they meet the Goddess Zenethia at the Mountain Pass Shrine, who calls this world Zeniath and
instructs them to collect Benevolence if they wish to advance to the forbidden lands of the West.

318521.<center>アマラーク王国 メネト村 ムニエカの町\nゼニアスの各地を巡り:
Amarak Kingdom Menet Village MuniekaAfter traveling around the various regions of Zeniath, helping the people there and
collecting Benevolence, the door to the western lands finally opens. During his search, he met a boy named Raki, who asked him
to free the Goddess Zenethia, who was sealed up in The Tree's Cage.

318522.<center>ウォルドの聖簾の先にある ゼニスの封宮の\n大祭壇に進むと 創失:
When you advance to The Great Altar of the Palace of Zenith beyond Angelfall, you will find a sleeping giant who unleashes a curse of
unmaking. Raki, who had been strongly opposed to entering the palace, transforms into a beast and attacks you. As he fights off his
resistance, Zenethia reveals a shocking revelation. The source of the unmaking curse that consumes the world is Zenith's creator
god, Gran Zenith.

318523.<center>ゼネシアは 大祭壇の扉を閉ざし\n創失の呪いから アストルティア:
Zenethia has closed the doors of the Great Altar and asks for your help in awakening Gran Zenith to save Astoltia and Zeniath... the two
worlds from the curse of unmaking. Let's go to Angelfall.
